*Shadow Cat sighs and throws up her arms. She hated to re-explain things, 
but she knew Iron Raptor was having a hard time keeping track of things.*

" Those Big, alien bots that are after Snow tech and I, you know, The BIG 
ones,"

* She exasperated big with her hands, making large circular motions with 
them to prove her point*

" Well, they're back. But don't panic. I think we can use them to our 
advantage if things get too rough with the preds."

*Shae smiles and looks at Snow Tech as he walks up, Cocking an eye-brow.*

" What in the inferno happened to you?"

*Snow tech plops down on the ground, crossing his legs as he sat. He sighs 
and looks up at Iron Raptor.*

" I hate Large ugly things that look like bugs, don't you?"

* The little kitten began to purr loudly while Iron Raptor stroked his back. 
He smiles an up-side down smile and settles down to a nice, long, lesiurely 
nap. Kneading as he did so.*







>From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: Iron I need a Reply
>Date: Tue, 23 Jan 2001 19:00:45 -0800
>
>
>* Iron Raptor sighed and looked over as a small opening in the shields
>appeared where the captivs of the Alliance exited, watching the carefully
>before grabbing hold of the kitten and taking him out. Telling him dangle 
>in
>mid-air for a second before putting him in her arms and stroking him for a
>moment. She was going to hold onto him until everything was cleared up, 
>just
>to keep him safe.
>She heard FZ announce that they were leaving and the stress in her 
>shoulders
>relaxed and she gave a little sigh of relief.
>Now they would have time to recover and repair...and repair a lot! The CF
>was a wreck, and so were most of the Maximals.
>Iron Raptor looked at Shadow Cat as she spoke, cocking an eye brow.*
>
>" What?"
>
>* With her thoughts on the battle and Alliance she had hardly heard Shadow
>Cat.*
>
